name: Vlive Darker
description: Vlive.tv dark mode that's less blue than vlive Dark.

user.name: rekorex
user.about: Code chimp trying to be a code monkey

additional_info:
0.3 - Hey guys how are you doing? I'm good, thanks for asking. Anyway here's a few more edits to keep it fresh. Peace out. 
0.2 - I finally logged in to find out some of the page elements were still bright. How dare they, anyhoo all fixed now.
0.1 - Initial release - If I have some time, I'll merge dark and darker together under drop-down menus. If I can figure it out that is.
